website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, practical, and easy to use. A good choice for climbers who want a straightforward design for rappelling and descending.
pros: Features a figure-8 design that works well in a variety of conditions and a sturdy build that's made to last
Some owners rave about how well it works for practicing aerial skills, too

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions of this are incorrect. It is not 5.6" x 5.9". It is 6.5" x 6.5". I submitted this information more than 5 weeks ago and it is still not corrected. I already had another brand of Rescue 8 that was 6.5" x 6.5 " and bought this one because I was looking for a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Large, durable, and light.
customer_reviews.text: I use this when rigging from a tree. It is quite large but that is a plus. It is light due to aluminum construction and is strong at 40Kn rating. My very heavy stainless steal figure 8 is only 50 Kn rated so not much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great for rigging aerial silks
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Please make sure you know how to rig your equipment safely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Brunner

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my Yoga swing/trapeese, Super heavy duty. Great quality. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: It's a rescue 8, it works or it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a rescue 8, it works or it doesn't. I'm still here, so it works! Mine is definitely showing some wear, the finish will chip off if you carry it in a bag with other bits of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: working great
customer_reviews.text: These are working great for my daughters hammock silks in her room. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at an affordable price. Big but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i need/as advertised. I didn't check the dimensions if that's something specific you need
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Aerial Silk usage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aerial silks and it works great and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: RockClimbing FilBilly

customer_reviews.title: for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for rigging my silks. Does exactly what I need it to, for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Rescue 8 for Rappelling
customer_reviews.text: Great Rescue 8. Will definitely buy this brand again. Used rappelling this weekend and had 0 issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fast shipping & well worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Solid..
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. But, can't wait to try it..
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Muller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lov it so far I have used it several times...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than steel
customer_reviews.text: Great at keeping heat from friction low compared to steel
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used it mine for the first time today. what you see is what you get. its metal it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Epic Peak Rescue Figure 8 Descender - Gear for Belaying, Rappelling, Rock Climbing, Training, Emergency - Serious Rope Action and Control - Large Bent Ears, Belay Slots - 40 KN, 9000lbs. Limit
product_meta.description:
Looking for a safe way to slow down your descents?

Rock climbing isn't just about successfully getting to the top - you also need to master climbing down safely. When descending, you need to be able to control the speed of your descent. Doing so will help prevent you from dropping straight down and hurting yourself.

Want to enjoy excellent rope control during your rappelling descents? Using a heavy-duty figure 8 descender is an effective solution.

Climb down like a pro with the Epic Peak Figure 8 Descender.

This rescue 8 descender is designed to give you better control of the climbing rope, providing braking resistance so you can safely climb down at a comfortable speed. It features thick ears, large holes, and belay slots where you can easily loop your climbing ropes and attach your carabiner.

With its thick design, this figure 8 descender dissipates heat from friction efficiently and is able to hold up to 9000lbs of weight. Its smooth design makes way for excellent rope action and better rope control.

The bent ears reduce the risk of ropes slipping up into a girth hitch and make it easier for you to tie-off when on rappel.

Need more time to make up your mind? Check out more features of this figure 8 descender right here:

⛰️ No rough spots to ensure smooth rope movement
⛰️ Fits easily in your outdoor backpack
⛰️ Use with ropes of different diameters
⛰️ Easy to use in adverse conditions
⛰️ Free Epic Peak decal with every purchase

Climb down easily, safely and comfortably. Click to add the Epic Peak Figure 8 Descender to your cart NOW!
feature_bullets: ⛰ HEAVY DUTY, DURABLE BUILD - Take this rescue 8 descender with you on all your outdoor climbing adventures. With its sturdy design, enjoy safe and worry-free descents every single time.
⛰ SUPERB ROPE CONTROL - This rappelling descender features ears and belays slots that make handling of heavy loads easier. The ears allow you to tie off your rope and use both your hands freely.
⛰ HOLDS MORE WEIGHT - With its 40 KN break strength and 9000lbs. weight limit, this belaying device is ready to hold up heavy weights without showing any signs of weakness or cracking.
⛰ PROVIDES RELIABLE BRAKING RESISTANCE - Use this rope descender together with your climbing harness and locking carabiner to help you slow down the speed of your descent when rappelling.
⛰ VERSATILE USE - Use this rescue 8 descender with climbing ropes of varying diameters. This device may be used for rock climbing, belaying, sport rappelling, rescue operations, and cave exploration.
